Html:
I am creating a graph with integers on Y axis, I want to set values of Y axis to 0 as minimum and 100 as maximum. How to set it ? I have used the following XAML code to set the vertical axis.

<d3:ChartPlotter.VerticalAxis>
<d3:VerticalIntegerAxis Name="countAxis" />
</d3:ChartPlotter.VerticalAxis>
